name: Your Own Drum
description:
by the beat of your own drum,
strike forth. any wall will yield
to your dogged persistence

Windows only.

Controls:
  space: new game
  wasd: slam against wall

Credits:
  game: wan may
  toki pona text: jan Temili
  additional sounds: Lazore
  linja sike font: jan Lipamanka
  engine: LÖVE. contains code from various projects, see license.txt for details
